CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Administrative proceedings;Article 6-1 - Impartial tribunal;Independent tribunal)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in LOC .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was dismissed from the ORG non - commissioned officer vocational high school due to non - compliance with admission pre - conditions . On DATE the applicant brought an action before ORG and requested the annulment of the dismissal decision .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s request , taking into account the “ secret documents ” submitted by ORG . These documents were not disclosed to the applicant . This decision was served on the applicant on DATE .
